alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 07 at 1:47PM MST until March 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches; 8 to 12 inches in the mountains, with locally higher amounts up to 18 inches in the Salt Range. * WHERE...Star Valley and Salt River and Wyoming Ranges. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley
